item.title: RT Ollama: It's toy time, Saturday! Day 9: AI Tamago is a tamagotchi-like game that has its thoughts and feelings generated via a LLM. It can be run l...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇOllama
It's toy time, Saturday! Day 9:

AI Tamago is a tamagotchi-like game that has its thoughts and feelings generated via a LLM.

It can be run locally, 100% Javascript-based, and costs $0 to run.

It's an amazing project by @stuffyokodraws

Source:
https://github.com/ykhli/AI-tamago

item.title: RT Lance Martin: Local multi-modal LLMs Multi-modal LLMs will be useful for tasks like image extraction, visual Q+A, etc. But running them locally / i...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇLance Martin
Local multi-modal LLMs

Multi-modal LLMs will be useful for tasks like image extraction, visual Q+A, etc. But running them locally / in private mode has been a challenge.

@OLLAMA just added support local / private multi-modal LLMs. E.g., see many version of LLaVA here that can‚Ä¶ https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1736107788039065623

6 different types of cognitive architectures

item.title: RT Brace: Don't have access to the Mistral API yet? No need to worry. @LangChainAI ü¶úüîó TS v0.0.208 supports the @togethercompute API, with Mistra...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇBrace
Don't have access to the Mistral API yet? No need to worry. @LangChainAI ü¶úüîó TS v0.0.208 supports the @togethercompute API, with Mistral 8x7b in general availability!

See the docs for how to start using the API now:

https://js.langchain.com/docs/integrations/llms/togetherai


Brace:‚ÄÇüßô Mistral AI API Integration üßô

@LangChainAI üîóü¶ú just added a package for interacting with the @MistralAI chat, streaming and embedding endpoints, all seamlessly integrated with LangChain's ecosystem.

Download the package here:

https://www.npmjs.com/package/@langchain/mistralai

Read the docs here:‚Ä¶ https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1735376742108545433

item.title: RT Harpreet Sahota üë®üèΩ‚Äçüíª ü•ë: I'm the kind of guy who doesn't settle for benchmarks ‚Äì I roll up my sleeves and dive headfirst into the acti...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇHarpreet Sahota üë®üèΩ‚Äçüíª ü•ë
I'm the kind of guy who doesn't settle for benchmarks ‚Äì I roll up my sleeves and dive headfirst into the action.

Benchmarks are great but hard to grasp and wrap my head around; I need to feel how a model works and go through the motions to believe it.

It's how I grok things.‚Ä¶ https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1735723440643117387
